title: My blue project
excerpt: This project is blue a purple becuse that is trendy.

description.client: The client was very anonying like always, he was constantly reminding me about the money he paid me.
description.proposal: I proposed something expensive because I wanted to earn more mony, I had some old codes that I could reuse.
description.results: The client was happy, he paid late (like always) but I earn a lot of money because I reuse most of the code form another project.
